Oh, BTW, the translation is a bit different from Chinese and English version. Chinese version says that she's keeping all his money the coming payday, while English only mentions that she's keeping the money he gave her this time. And I read the Japanese version, and the Chinese version is the correct translation. English version isn't translated correctly lol

This is a pure misunderstanding. Her moles are in different position. If you compare the 1st page and page 19, the girl on 1st page has her moles on top 2 and bottom right position, while her moles are on top right and bottom 2 position. But she did acknowledged him as her boyfriend since he promised to give her all his money from work if she becomes his girlfriend and she said she will be collecting all his money at the end of the month. I think she did like him but didn't spell it out. Who will go to the same person's house everyday after school if they don't like that person?
